name: Heal Instantly
game_info: Heal this Unit 50 HP. Doing so will Consume this Opportunity to choose a Promotion.

name: Shock I
game_info: +15% Combat Strength when fighting in OPEN Terrain. (NO Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Shock II
game_info: +15% Combat Strength when fighting in OPEN Terrain. (NO Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Shock III
game_info: +15% Combat Strength when fighting in OPEN Terrain. (NO Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Drill I
game_info: +15% Combat Strength when fighting in ROUGH Terrain. (Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Drill II
game_info: +15% Combat Strength when fighting in ROUGH Terrain. (Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Drill III
game_info: +15% Combat Strength when fighting in ROUGH Terrain. (Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Accuracy I
game_info: +15% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength against Units in OPEN Terrain. (NO Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Accuracy II
game_info: +15% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength against Units in OPEN Terrain. (NO Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Accuracy III
game_info: +15% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength against Units in OPEN Terrain. (NO Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Barrage I
game_info: +15% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength against Units in ROUGH Terrain. (Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Barrage II
game_info: +15% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength against Units in ROUGH Terrain. (Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Barrage III
game_info: +15% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] Ranged Combat Strength against Units in ROUGH Terrain. (Hills, Forest or Jungle).

name: Volley
game_info: +50% Combat Strength VS Fortified Units and Cities.

name: Medic
game_info: All units in adjacent tiles Heal 5 Additional HP per turn.

name: Medic II
game_info: All units in adjacent tiles Heal 5 Additional HP per turn. This unit Heals 5 Additional HP per turn when Outside of Friendly Territory.

name: Amphibious
game_info: Eliminates combat penalty for attacking from the sea or over a river.

name: Indirect Fire
game_info: Ranged attacks may be performed over obstacles (as long as other friendly units can see the target).

name: Supply
game_info: May heal damage Outside of Friendly Territory. 15 HP healed per turn.

name: March
game_info: Unit will Heal Every Turn, even if it performs an action.

name: Woodsman
game_info: Double movement rate Through Forest and Jungle.

name: Interception I
game_info: +33% Combat Strength when intercepting enemy aircraft.

name: Interception II
game_info: +33% Combat Strength when intercepting enemy aircraft.

name: Interception III
game_info: +34% Combat Strength when Intercepting enemy aircraft.

name: Dogfighting I
game_info: +33% Combat Strength when performing an Air Sweep.

name: Dogfighting II
game_info: +33% Combat Strength when performing an Air Sweep.

name: Dogfighting III
game_info: +34% Combat Strength when performing an Air Sweep.

name: Sortie
game_info: 1 extra Interception may be made per turn.

name: Repair
game_info: Unit will Heal Every Turn, even if it performs an action.

name: Air Repair
game_info: Unit will Heal Every Turn, even if it performs an action.

name: Evasion
game_info: Reduces damage taken from interception by 50%.

name: Survivalism I
game_info: +5 HP healed per turn outside of friendly territory and +25% Defense.

name: Survivalism II
game_info: +5 HP healed per turn outside of friendly territory and +25% Defense.

name: Survivalism III
game_info: Unit will Heal Every Turn, even if it performs an action. Unit will attempt to withdraw when faced with a melee attack.

name: Coastal Raider I
game_info: +20% Combat Strength when attacking Cities. Steal gold equal to 33% of the damage inflicted on a city.

name: Coastal Raider II
game_info: +20% Combat Strength when attacking Cities. Steal gold equal to 33% of the damage inflicted on a city.

name: Coastal Raider III
game_info: +20% Combat Strength when attacking Cities. Steal gold equal to 34% of the damage inflicted on a city.

name: Boarding Party I
game_info: +15% Combat Strength in melee attacks against Naval Units.

name: Boarding Party II
game_info: +15% Combat Strength in melee attacks against Naval Units.

name: Boarding Party III
game_info: +15% Combat Strength in melee attacks against Naval Units.

name: Discipline
game_info: +15% Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly Unit.

name: Embarkation with Defense
game_info: Can embark onto Water Tiles. Embarked units defend at double strength.

name: Embarkation with Ocean Movement
game_info: Can embark onto Water Tiles. Embarked units can enter Ocean and have +1 Sight.

name: Air Recon
game_info: 6 tiles in every direction always visible.

name: Air Sweep
game_info: Can Air Sweep to clear intercepting Units.

name: Rough Terrain Penalty
game_info: Entering rough terrain consumes all movement.

name: Astronomy Needed
game_info: Cannot Enter Deep Ocean Until Astronomy.

name: Hovering Unit
game_info: Unit may pass over Mountains, but takes damage if ending its turn on a Mountain.

name: Must Set Up to Ranged Attack
game_info: Must Set Up to Ranged Attack

name: Ranged Support Fire
game_info: Provides Support Fire to Friendly Units When Fortified.

name: Leadership
game_info: Improves combat effectiveness of nearby land units.

name: Great Generals I
game_info: Combat Likely To Create Great Generals.

name: Great Generals II
game_info: Combat Very Likely To Create Great Generals.

name: Heal 50 Damage If Kills a Unit
game_info: Heals 50 Damage If Kills Non-Barbarian Unit.

name: Heals 25 Damage If Kills a Unit
game_info: Heals 25 Damage If Kills a Unit

name: Damaged Enemy Bonus (33)
game_info: Combat Bonus against Damaged Enemy Units (33).

name: Enhanced Medic
game_info: This unit and all others in adjacent tiles Heal 15 Additional HP per turn.

name: Haka War Dance
game_info: Enemy units receive -10% Combat Strength when adjacent to any unit with this promotion.

name: Bonuses in Snow, Tundra, and Hills
game_info: In Snow, Tundra, Hills: +25% Combat Bonus (if Forest or Jungle is not present) and Double Movement

name: Feared Elephant
game_info: Enemy units receive -10% Combat Strength when adjacent to any unit with this promotion.

name: Near Capital Bonus
game_info: 30% stronger while fighting in the capital; bonus falls off as the unit gets further away.

name: Extra Sight While Embarked
game_info: See further than a normal embarked unit.

name: Transfer Movement to General
game_info: Great General moves at rate of this unit if they start the turn stacked.

name: Great General Combat Bonus
game_info: 15% combat bonus with Great General in same tile.

name: City Attack Only
game_info: Unit may not attack units, only cities.

name: War Canoes
game_info: Embarked units have double the usual defense strength and see further than a normal embarked unit.

name: Prize Ships
game_info: Defeated enemy naval units may join your side.

name: Naval Leadership
game_info: Improves combat effectiveness of nearby naval units.

name: Unwelcome Evangelist
game_info: Can enter rival territory without open borders but loses 25% of original religious strength for each turn they end on such a tile. Unit is eliminated when religious strength is 0.

name: Withdraw Before Melee
game_info: Unit will withdraw when faced with melee attack. Chance of withdrawal decreased against fast enemy units or if there are limited open tiles behind the unit.

name: Buffalo Chest
game_info: +10% Combat Strength when fighting in OPEN Terrain. (NO Hills, Forest or Jungle). Flank attack bonus increased by 25%. +10% Defense against all Ranged Attacks.

name: Buffalo Loins
game_info: +10% Combat Strength. Flank attack bonus increased by 25%. +10% Defense against all Ranged Attacks.

name: Buffalo Horns
game_info: +1 Movement. Flank attack bonus increased by 25%. +10% Defense against all Ranged Attacks.

name: Spear Throw
game_info: Before engaging in melee, this unit has an extra attack.

name: Trade Mission Bonus
game_info: +100% more Gold and +100% more city-state influence than a normal Trade Mission.

name: Heavy Charge
game_info: Forces defender to retreat if it inflicts more damage than it receives. A defender who cannot retreat takes extra damage.

name: Sapper
game_info: When next to an enemy city, other units within 2 tiles get a 50% Bonus when attacking the city.

name: Golden Age from Victories
game_info: Earn points toward a Golden Age for each enemy killed.

name: Homeland Guardian
game_info: +25% Bonus in combat in your territory

name: Pride of the Ancestors
game_info: +15% Bonus in combat in your territory

name: Desert Warrior
game_info: +50% Combat Strength when fighting in Desert

name: Native Tongue
game_info: May choose benefit when discovering Ancient Ruins.

name: Altitude Training
game_info: Double movement in hill. +10% Combat Strength when fighting in Hill.

name: Mystic Blade
game_info: Promotion is replaced with a randomly chosen new promotion after the unit completes its first combat

name: Invulnerability
game_info: +30% Combat Bonus when defending. +20 Hit Points when healing

name: Heroism
game_info: Unit awards combat bonus to nearby units as if it is a Great General

name: Ambition
game_info: +50% Combat Bonus when attacking. -20% penalty when defending

name: Recruitment
game_info: Heals All Damage If Kills Non-Barbarian Unit

name: Enemy Blade
game_info: Takes 20 Damage If Ends Turn in Enemy Territory

name: Evil Spirits
game_info: -10% penalty when attacking. -30% penalty when defending

name: Skyranger
game_info: May paradrop with extended range (40 hexes)

name: Lightning Warfare
game_info: +15% Combat Bonus when attacking. +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement. Ignore enemy Zones of Control.

name: Exotic Cargo
game_info: May Sell Exotic Goods when adjacent to a foreign tile to gain Gold and XP based on distance from capital, but only once.

name: City Plunder
game_info: Steals Gold equal to 100% of the damage inflicted on a city.
